Pre-Game Insights: England fast bowler Reece Topley believes the Daren Sammy Cricket Ground will turn into a 'cauldron' when the two most successful Twenty20 sides meet in their Super Eight game.
West Indies have not lost a game so far in the tournament, while England has been on the brink of elimination but has hit form in their last three group games.
West Indies captain Rovman Powell praised his team's form and spinner Akael Hosein's performance.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch in Saint Lucia is expected to produce high-scoring results and aid batters.
Wind will play a role in the game and both sides will look to use it to their advantage while bowling and batting.
The weather forecast is humid with patchy clouds and a low chance of evening showers.
